title: gantez
author: gantez
content: There is another history that Messi has attach to himself and that is the psg glory. I am reading online that Messi  joined Ronaldinho, Mbappe and others for the players winning the world cup after joining the club of PSG. Messi is a lucky player. He has achieved many benefits in his football career.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Did you wanna say that if a player wanna try to win the world cup trophy and then he must be joining with PSG to be able to win the world cup trophy? I think that's only coincidence. People might think if that was make a sense but i personally would be disagreed with it. The thing that i believe if the result from world cup would be giving impact to the bookies over PSG. It seems like that PSG's odd will be affecting when it will be facing bayern in the last 16 of champion league as mbappe and messi are on the same club.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: OP is trying to let you know that PSG is a good clubs that has world class players,imagine the two rival in the world cup which is Messi and Mbappe are both playing in PSG presently and they are the ones on peoples lips about their brilliant performance in this world cup. They were also the two challenging themselves on who will be highest goal scorer. This is reputation and shows the quality of PSG.I have also thought of this myself when I noticed it and all I could do was to give PSG kuddos for having these great players in their club. PSG are presently inform and only Bayern Munich is the challenge which they have. Superstars have also played in PSG likewise Real Madrid.

comments.author: Ulven
comments.body: Indeed, there are a large number of players who won the World Cup who were playing for Paris, but I do not agree with your opinion here that anyone who wants to win the World Cup must join the Parisian club.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: It is true that the just concluded world cup has two players who contested for the cup and highest goals scored and no doubt PSG is one of the best clubs. Maybe this has happened by chance that the two players are from one club. Messi is lucky maybe if he was still in Barcelona the cup would not get to him in his lifetime.

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: In fact, we see that it's not only Messi which play for Argentina, there are many players who strengthen Argentina, and it's not just PSG players. But it is true that PSG looking for talent is the best, they always bring experienced people to the club, the history of players will be important for club. Neymar Messi but for Mbappe I think they are lucky to have this guy, he was offered to move Real Madrid but he chose PSG. At PSG playing with the seniors of football made this man very perfect his young age.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Well you can't blame PSG. They are only accepting talents with a very huge potential and do have the pockets to support this ambition of theirs. Also, players of the highest caliber would naturally want to join a club that can pay them the highest amount of $$$, and what other clubs can offer that all the while ensuring that the career of the player is preserved due to their reputation? I think Messi isn't lucky; he has worked so hard to be where he is right now, and that to me is dedication and talent, not just luck.

comments.author: gantez
comments.body: Quote from: Frankolala on December 19, 2022, 03:56:24 PMOP is trying to let you know that PSG is a good clubs that has world class players,imagine the two rival in the world cup which is Messi and Mbappe are both playing in PSG presently and they are the ones on peoples lips about their brilliant performance in this world cup. They were also the two challenging themselves on who will be highest goal scorer. This is reputation and shows the quality of PSG.I have also thought of this myself when I noticed it and all I could do was to give PSG kuddos for having these great players in their club. PSG are presently inform and only Bayern Munich is the challenge which they have. Superstars have also played in PSG likewise Real Madrid.That is it that PSG produce high quality players in the past and present that they went up to world cup level and won it. This means PSG is known for talent that will shine and produce good result for the club name. This is the glory also for the club to have high quality of players in their history that won the world cup.

comments.author: bitzizzix
comments.body: One of the two clubs that are said to be the most capable of paying Messi's wages is PSG and a financially strong club, besides that the PSG club president, Nasser Al-Khelaifi is also a big fan of Messi and has been a young player for a long time. entrepreneur wants to bring in a player nicknamed the kit. When the opportunity opened up, Al-Khelaifi was willing to fulfill Messi's wishes in his contract.PSG is the best club and is also supported by very strong finances, so that any player he thinks is good can be brought in by PSG.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: It's either that joining PSG is lucky for those individuals who wanted to win a world cup or simply this is just a coincidence, or it just that PSG is a good team that every upcoming players wanted to join, improved there games that when they go out and play under their country, then countries of winning multiplied.So there could be connections by could not be treated as 100% could be true for the future world cup winners.

comments.author: Zackgeno96
comments.body: It is not surprising that PSG has had a lot of players at the World Cup. These are all stars of strong teams, and almost all of them participated in the World Cup. Nice to see that it was spread over different countries. Di Maria, Neymar, Mbappe all from 3 different countries. And now I will no doubt forget a few more who also participated. The owner of PSG is also from Qatar and is very wealthy. The club is made up of money, you can see that in the players. They've gotten better in recent years.

comments.author: Desmong
comments.body: I am very surprised that most of the great players that had played and are playing for PSG has won the world cup which Messi had proved that and make it very clear. I hope this will continue so that there will be more interested players too that will be ready to play. Messi is one of my favorites players and I am very happy to see him winning the world best position once again.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Quote from: Frankolala on December 19, 2022, 03:56:24 PMOP is trying to let you know that PSG is a good clubs that has world class players,imagine the two rival in the world cup which is Messi and Mbappe are both playing in PSG presently and they are the ones on peoples lips about their brilliant performance in this world cup. They were also the two challenging themselves on who will be highest goal scorer. This is reputation and shows the quality of PSG.I have also thought of this myself when I noticed it and all I could do was to give PSG kuddos for having these great players in their club. PSG are presently inform and only Bayern Munich is the challenge which they have. Superstars have also played in PSG likewise Real Madrid.I think op,  is really just trying to point out that Lionel Messi has joined the list of psg players that have won the world cup. Although you are right that psg has  good class of players and individually these players have achieved enough in their football careers but the main point here is that all the above mentioned players won the world cup after they sign and played for psg.But what baffles me most about this psg club is that with all the great players that have played for psg, they still  haven't won the uefa champions league which is truly a dissapointment for such a big club like psg.
